HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Kook-nyangie (Cute Jungkook) - *ê¾¹ëƒ¥ì´ is a combination of Jungkook's name and "nyangie" which is a cute way to refer to a cat, emphasizing his cute and adorable side.*

Jung í–‰ë³µ only (Wishing only happiness for Jung - Jungkook's family name is Jeon/Jung) - *It's a shortened version of "ì •êµ­, ë¬´ì¡°ê±´ í–‰ë³µí•´ì•¼ ë¼, ì•Œì§€?" (Jungkook, you absolutely have to be happy, you know?)*

Guk-Tokki (Rabbit Jungkook) - *Tokki means Rabbit, often used to describe Jungkook's cute bunny-like features.*

Jeon-mot-al (Jeon doesn't know) - *Derived from "Jeon (Jungkook's last name) mot arayo" (Jeon doesn't know). Often used playfully when Jungkook acts innocent or doesn't understand something, even if he probably does.*
